item.title: Stitching Sheets: Using MongoDB Stitch to Create an API for Data in Google Sheets
item.description: MongoDB Stitch is a power tool in your toolbox, capable of integrating your databases to any service with a publically available API. I’ve written a number of articles on this on MongoDB’s Blog but in this article, I’ll share a quick lesson on how to integrate data from Google Sheets, Google’s online spreadsheet, into MongoDB using MongoDB Stitch. Watch the video or read on to learn what’s involved. Starting the Workflow There are two key elements that make this solution work.
